tool_description: Taobao Tmall 1688  API Documentation API Interface Get ✔️ API 1688✔️ API taobao/Tmall
title: OPEN Taobao 1688

api_list.name: Get Item Search Taobao/Tmall
Get Item Detail Taobao/Tmall
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://open-taobao-1688.p.rapidapi.com/taobao/products/{num_iid}/?"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "open-taobao-1688.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
